EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hey {!Contact.FirstName},
I thought you might enjoy this intriguing article about the new SelfServ 80 Series ATMs from NCR. The NCR SelfServ 80 Series is a range of ATMs designed to reinvent self-service and enable financial institutions to enhance the customer experience.
NCR debuts mobile-ready, video-enabled 80 Series ATM family
By leveraging new interaction models that support the omni-channel mobile-first consumer, the NCR SelfServ ATM family helps you engage consumers in ways no one else can.
These interactions support the way today’s tech-savvy consumers navigate their everyday lives and can help strengthen your position as the contemporary, customer-focused FI your consumers want.
What do you think?
Is your FI ready to offer a more personal and engaging experience to your consumers?
I hope you enjoyed the article! Let me know what you thought.
Martin Lopez Sales Development Executive – Financial Services NCR Corporation, World Headquarters Duluth GA USA office: 678.808.7917 | mobile: 425-200-5654 martin.lopez@ncr.com | www.ncr.com
